subject: Where’s my order? Order #SSN1539
description_text:
I placed an order on May 26th and would have thought it had shipped by now,
but I haven’t got any emails about shipping details etc.

My order number is in the subject line, but order #
SSN1539

conversations.body_text: Hi Rick,  Your order has been shipped. The tracking number is: UPS • 1ZH912Y00332150759, and it is expected to be delivered on June 7th.
